sub_topic: Finding the Hamiltonian cycle in a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following undirected graph:

```
A --- B
|     |
C --- D
```

What is the Hamiltonian cycle in this graph?
message_2:
A Hamiltonian cycle is a closed loop on a graph where every node is visited exactly once. In this graph, there is one Hamiltonian cycle:

A -> B -> D -> C -> A
